text: The Alfa Romeo 147 is a car produced by Alfa Romeo from 2000 until 2010. It replaced the Alfa Romeo 146. == Engines == * 1.6 Twin Spark 16V 77 kW (105 hp) and 88 kW (120 hp) * 2.0 Twin Spark 16V 110 kW (150 hp) * 3.2 GTA V6 24V 184 kW (250 hp) * 1.9 JTD 8V 74 kW (100 hp) and 85 kW (115 hp) * 1.9 Multijet 8V 88 kW (120 hp) * 1.9 JTD 16V 103 kW (140 hp) * 1.9 Multijet 16V 110 kW (150 hp) and 125 kW (170 hp) 147 Category:Front wheel drive vehicles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Alfa Romeo 147
